TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi BooleanLiteral extends dylan.NET.Tokenizer.AST.Tokens.Literals.Literal implements class dylan.NET.Tokenizer.AST.Interfaces.INegatable

Docs.remarks: It is usually one of the literals 'true' or 'false'.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.remarks: Also sets the LitTyp field to an instance of BooleanTok.

Docs.param: The boolean value to assign to the BooleanLiteral.
Docs.summary: Constructs a new BooleanLiteral with the given value.
Docs.remarks: Sets the Value and LitTyp fields accodingly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

Docs.param: The value to give the 'Value' field which is useless in this case.
Docs.remarks: Also sets the LitTyp field to an instance of BooleanTok.

Docs.summary: Holds the value of the literal.
Docs.remarks: This value is loaded as the number 1 or 0 for true or false repectively.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool DoNeg { get; set; }
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the dylan.NET syntax that is parsable into this literal.
Docs.returns: The dylan.NET syntactic equivalent to this literal ie. "true" or "false".
